General.Name: StoneBridge Ventures Inc.
General.Description: Stonebridge Ventures Inc. is a venture capital firm. The firm operates as a subsidiary of Stonebridge Capital Inc. It considers growth capital, secondary investments and invests across all stages: seeding, early to mid-stage and late stage. The firm considers investments in manufacturing including smart farm, smart city, smart factory; artificial intelligence; research and development; biotechnology and healthcare; future automobiles; drones; semiconductors; and financial technology through its funds. The firm exits through initial public offering, mergers and acquisitions, and trade sale. Stonebridge Ventures Inc. was founded in 2017 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 11th Floor, KFAS Building, Seoul, South Korea, 06141
